q2: If Colombia can stay healthy, they can win Copa America.
a2: Probably win the america cup, it's a good team
q3: Do you really think they can compete with the Americans?
a3: Columbia played well against America in 2016
q4: Colombia are a great side. Ramadal Falcao is an excellent striker and a great captain
a4: Colombia stands a chance against America if they rally together and play their hardest, but it will no doubt be a tough game.
q5: America are a weaker side than Colombia I think
a5: America need to develop their players better to compete with South American teams like Colombia
